snippet.title: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - Development Update
snippet.description:
Wishlist Evil Genius 2: World Domination on Steam http://reb.to/EvilGenius2WDWish
Sign-up NOW for all the latest information, a FREE Evil Genius Soundtrack, a FREE Evil Genius 2 in-game item*, and more at https://evilgeniusgame.com/ 

Join Lead Designer Rich Edwards as he shares never before revealed secrets and insights about the recent Gameplay trailer from, returning and new Evil Geniuses, creating rooms, new traps, powerful henchmen, DOOMSDAY DEVICES!, and so much more! 

Plus, a development update from CEO and co-founder of Rebellion Jason Kingsley and the reveal of original Evil Genius composer James Hannigan who is returning to create nefarious music for Evil Genius 2.

How excited for Evil Genius 2 are you? Do you have some questions? Drop a comment below and let are minions know!

Follow us on:
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official/  
Mixer: https://mixer.com/rebellion_official   
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EvilGeniusGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/evilgenius
Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/evilgenius_game/  

Find out more about Evil Genius 2 at https://evilgeniusgame.com/

Find out more about Rebellion at https://rebellion.com/

#Rebellion #EvilGenius2 #EvilGenius2Gameplay 

*Free item TBC. Requires email sign-up. You may unsubscribe at any time.
